overview: Have you ever wondered what the girls really do when they get together at the salon? Well, they gossip, of course. Adorable Carmen Hart leads a team of sexy hairstylists as they dish the dirt with their clients. These steamy tales are loaded with sizzling action. From an intense four-way to a scorching girl-girl and a nasty double penetration, these girls aren't afraid to kiss and tell! This scorcher also features Alexis Malone, Jada Fire, Katie morgan, Rebecca Love, Roxy Jezel, Sativa Rose and Tory Lane!
tagline: You Won't Believe What These Girls Say... And Do!
title: Gossip
